Class StudentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.spacive.apps.ejazdybackend.controller.StudentController

  • @RestController
 @CrossOrigin
 @RequestMapping(value="/students")
public class StudentController
extends java.lang.Object
    REST API for students resource.

      • getAllStudents

        @GetMapping
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\', \'ROLE_INSTRUCTOR\')")
public java.util.List<CognitoUser> getAllStudents()
        List all students.

        Allowed only for instructor and admin.

        Returns:
        list of students.

      • inviteStudent

 @PreAuthorize(value="hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\')")
public CognitoUser inviteStudent(@RequestParam(value="email")
                                                                                              java.lang.String email)
        Invite new student by email.

        Allowed only for admin.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        new user instance.

      • deleteStudent

 @PreAuthorize(value="hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\')")
public CognitoUser deleteStudent(@PathVariable
                                                                                                               java.lang.String id)
        Delete student.

        Allowed only for admin.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        instance of deleted student.

      • getLessonsByStudent

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\', \'ROLE_INSTRUCTOR\')")
 @GetMapping(value="/{id}/lessons")
public java.util.List<Lesson> getLessonsByStudent(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                             java.lang.String id,
                                                                                                                                                             @RequestParam(value="since")
                                                                                                                                                             java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> since,
                                                                                                                                                             @RequestParam(value="from")
                                                                                                                                                             java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> from,
                                                                                                                                                             @RequestParam(value="to")
                                                                                                                                                             java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> to)
        List lessons of student.

        When since is used, from and to cannot be used too. From and to have to be used together.

        Allowed only for admin and instructor.

        Parameters:
        id - id an unique id of student.
        since - optional date since.
        from - optional date from.
        to - optional date to.
        Returns:
        list of lessons.

      • getLessonsByMe

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasRole(\'ROLE_STUDENT\')")
 @GetMapping(value="/me/lessons")
public java.util.List<Lesson> getLessonsByMe(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth,
                                                                                                                                @RequestParam(value="since")
                                                                                                                                java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> since,
                                                                                                                                @RequestParam(value="from")
                                                                                                                                java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> from,
                                                                                                                                @RequestParam(value="to")
                                                                                                                                java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> to)
        Get lessons by invoking student.

        "me" path is used because we can avoid processing user roles inside controller methods.

        Allowed only for student.

        Parameters:
        auth - object which contains principal.
        since - optional date since.
        from - optional date from.
        to - optional date to.
        Returns:
        list of lessons.

      • getStudentHours

        @GetMapping(value="/{id}/hours")
public java.lang.Double getStudentHours(@PathVariable
                                                                         java.lang.String id)
        Get number of hours of finished lessons by student.

        Can be accessed by student, instructor, admin.

        Parameters:
        id - unique id of student.
        Returns:
        number of hours.
